name: old_map_bg.jpg
description: A full, high-resolution image of a sepia-toned, vintage world map with intricate details and aged texture, suitable for a background.

name: cash_cow.png
description: A stylized, cartoonish cow standing on all fours, viewed from a slight side angle, with its coat having green dollar bill patterns instead of regular spots, on a white background.

name: invasion_arrow.png
description: A bold, stylized, solid red arrow with a slight curve, pointing forward, appearing as if drawn with a clean marker stroke, on a white background.

name: server_room_bg.jpg
description: A full, atmospheric photograph looking down a long aisle of modern server racks with numerous small, blinking blue and green LED lights in a dark, moody environment.

name: aws_logo.png
description: The official Amazon Web Services (AWS) logo, featuring the orange smile and black text, perfectly rendered with a clean cutout on a white background.

name: dollar_bill.png
description: A crisp, single United States one-hundred-dollar bill, shown at a slight three-quarter angle as if floating, with realistic lighting on a white background.

name: data_bg.jpg
description: A full, abstract digital background image with a dark blue base, featuring glowing, thin, cyan and white lines that crisscross like circuits, with faint binary numbers scattered throughout.

name: profit_graph.png
description: A simple, clean line graph with a horizontal and vertical axis, where a single, bold, glowing green line starts low on the left and curves steeply upwards to the top right, on a white background.

name: cash_pile.png
description: A large, substantial pile of neatly stacked United States one-hundred-dollar bills, viewed from the front with crisp details and clean lighting, on a white background.

name: vault.png
description: A photorealistic, heavy, circular bank vault door made of polished steel, shown closed from a straight-on perspective, featuring a complex locking mechanism and a large central wheel, on a white background.

name: war_chest.png
description: An antique, dark wood treasure chest reinforced with rustic, dark iron straps and rivets, shown closed and viewed from a front three-quarter angle, on a white background.

name: grocery_aisle_bg.jpg
description: A full photograph looking down a wide, brightly lit, and modern grocery store aisle, with perfectly stocked shelves on both sides and a clean, reflective floor.

name: news_bg.jpg
description: A full background image designed like a modern TV news graphic, with a bold red and dark blue color scheme, abstract geometric shapes, and subtle globe motifs.

name: amazon_logo.png
description: The official Amazon logo with black text and the iconic orange smile arrow underneath, perfectly rendered on a white background.

name: whole_foods_logo.png
description: The official Whole Foods Market logo, featuring its green circular design with the stylized "O" as a piece of fruit, on a white background.

name: shattered_glass_overlay.png
description: A realistic pattern of sharp, white cracks spreading out from a central impact point, as if glass has been shattered, on a white background.

name: ecommerce_screen.png
description: A sleek, modern computer monitor frame, viewed from the front, displaying a generic, clean e-commerce website layout, with the entire monitor on a white background.

name: whole_foods_store.jpg
description: A full, high-quality photograph of the exterior of a modern Whole Foods Market store building on a bright, sunny day, showing the entrance and the company's sign.

name: stock_market_bg.jpg
description: A full, abstract background image representing the stock market, featuring a dark base with overlapping, semi-transparent line graphs, candlestick charts, and glowing red and green ticker numbers.

name: kroger_logo.png
description: The official modern Kroger logo in its distinctive blue color and font, on a white background.

name: costco_logo.png
description: The official Costco Wholesale logo in its classic red and blue colors, on a white background.

name: data_flow.png
description: A horizontal pattern of glowing, bright blue digital lines and circuits, with small nodes and particles moving along them to represent data flow from left to right, on a white background.

name: chessboard_bg.jpg
description: A full, dramatic, high-contrast photograph of a chessboard made of elegant, polished dark and light wood, taken from a top-down perspective with moody lighting.

name: amazon_chess_piece.png
description: A stylized, modern chess king piece made of a glossy black material, featuring a glowing, bright cyan outline, on a white background.
